dsOverview.title: U.S. AFGWC Global Surface Observations for SESAME, few days 1977Apr-Sep

summary.p: DSS acquired this data for Kreitzberg's work in the Severe Storms in American Midwest Experiment. Data exist only for a few days across the period from April to September 1977.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: DOD/USAF/AFWA > Air Force Weather Agency, U.S. Air Force, U.S. Department of Defense
